title: Rats in the Ranks
creator_credit: Robin Anderson, Bob Connolly, Arundel Productions, Film Australia and National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
brief_description: A behind-the-scenes look at political manoeuvering during the Mayoral elections for the Leichardt Council. Incumbent Larry Hand, while popular with the voters is not so popular with the Council.

constellations_other.name: Bob Connolly
constellations_other.description: Australian audiences just can't seem to get enough of exploring local governments, bureaucracy and politics, whether that's through documentaries or biting social satire.

creator_credit_for_label: Robin Anderson, Bob Connolly, Arundel Productions, Film Australia and National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
description: A behind-the-scenes look at political manoeuvering during the Mayoral elections for the Leichardt Council. Incumbent Larry Hand, while popular with the voters is not so popular with the Council. In the Mayoral elections, the Council not the citizens vote, so Hand and his opposition engage in a battle of political tactics including calling in favours, backstabbing and media leaks. Gripping real-life drama with a knuckle-biting climax.
description_for_label: A behind-the-scenes look at political manoeuvering during the Mayoral elections for the Leichardt Council.
